explanation: [0-0] A little boy wearing a red long-sleeved shirt and blue pants is standing in a living room with wooden flooring. On a wooden table to his right is a clear plastic container full of pet food. Behind the boy are a potted plant, a television mounted on the white wall, and a white TV stand. In the upper right corner of the screen are the words "KidsLine" in pink.

[0-3] The little boy walks up to the wooden table and casually reaches out to grab the clear plastic container full of pet food. But it's too heavy, and the container tips forward, spilling much of its contents. He hurriedly uses his right leg to prop up the container, working it upright along with the hand that is holding it.

[9-14] Finally, the shot changes again as the boy runs off, one foot stepping on the dog food. Then the little dog that was peeking out from behind the white wall comes running out, wagging its tail. It runs past the spot where the little boy had been and catches up to him, following behind. The little boy and the dog first run down a hallway with wooden flooring and white walls, then run toward the left and arrive at a bedroom hallway with wooden flooring and a white door.
